content: After defeating the Golden-Armored Rhino you'll gain the Gold Suozi Armor, which is the second part of Wukong's Set.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rhino Watch Slope' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Gold Armored Rhino'.
The content is as follows:
After defeating the Golden-Armored Rhino you'll gain the Gold Suozi Armor, which is the second part of Wukong's Set.
